summary: This is an email exchange between FBI and U.S. Attorney's Office personnel regarding the transmission of a document titled 'Epstein Plea', likely referring to plea agreement materials in the Jeffrey Epstein case. The email notes the document quality is poor as received.

persons.name: Richards, Jason R.
persons.context: Appears as the sender of an email forwarding a document titled 'Epstein Plea' to recipients, identified as an Assistant U.S. Attorney.

events.title: Transmission of Epstein Plea Document
events.description: An email exchange occurs where a document titled 'Epstein Plea' is forwarded between law enforcement and prosecution personnel.

keyFacts: An email dated June 27, 2008, discusses the transmission of a document titled 'Epstein Plea'.
The document is forwarded by Assistant U.S. Attorney Jason R. Richards.
The correspondence indicates coordination between the FBI and the U.S. Attorney's Office regarding the Epstein case at that time.
